text: Hi, have you heard of the children's charity called Save the Children?
Hello, How are you? I have heard but I do not have much information about it
It is an amazing organization that provides a lot of help to many children in the world.
What issues they are working on?
The help to promote issues that many children in the world are facing such as hungry, famine, abuse and civil war. They really make an impact to help improve the lives of children around the world.
That is very interesting, Are they clear with their financial reports? I mean is it a trustworthy organization?
Yes, a very trustworthy organization. I've donated to them in the past and I'm very happy with the results
good, is it an international organization or they just focus on one or few countries?
They focus on countries all around the world. Do you think you would be able to donate a small portion of your earnings today to the organization?
Sure I will be able to donate. I've been able to donate through MTurk. It makes me feel useful.
That's great to hear. I assure you that your donation will make a difference.
I am sure too, a little help can really make a big difference. It is surprising that even $30.00 per month can support a whole family
Yes, I've even heard where a $1 donation can make a difference. It is important, however, to make sure the organization is on the up and up
Yes and It is interesting how donating by HITs sometimes won't even hurt the payment. It is like they do it on their behalf
Yes, I've come across that as well. Fortunately any little bit can help
Yes, I also like when I see big charities cooperate with big companies. I like it when part of my purchase will be donated
Ah yes, that's always a nice benefit as well. I'm glad you chose to donate
I am glad too, is there any website that i can read more about this organization and use it if i want to donate later again?
Yes,  URL is the official website for the organization
thank you so much, I will take the time to read about it
